followedBy0: *NEW* Not followed by anyone you’re following
followedBy4Plus: *NEW* Followed by $p1$, $p2$ and $nr$ others you follow
biggerPreviewsDesc: 長的圖片在推文內顯示完整的高度
disableAutoRefresh: 禁用自動刷新 (實驗性功能)
disableAutoRefreshDesc:
禁用時間軸自動貼文刷新
實驗性功能，結果可能會不正常
fontOverrideDesc: *NEW* Set a custom font to override the default one. This works only if you have the font installed.
colorOverrideDesc: *NEW* Set a custom color to override the default one.
forceLatestDesc: 最新貼文模式不再是永久啟用的。啟用這個選項後網站會自動切換回最新貼文模式
hideMessageBoxDesc: *NEW* Hides the new, all time present message box in the bottom right corner.
keepTweetsInTL: 保留貼文 (目前沒有功能)
keepTweetsInTLDesc: 當貼文離開可視區時使網站不自動移除它
leftTrendsDesc: 在左側邊欄顯示流行趨勢
leftMediaDesc: *NEW* Show the media container on profile pages in the left sidebar.
enableQuickBlockDesc: *NEW* Hover over the follow button for 3 seconds to block a profile.
show10Trends: 總是顯示 10 個流行趨勢
smallSidebarsDesc: 使用 290px 的側邊欄 (預設 350px)
tweetIconsPullLeft: *NEW* Bunch up Tweet Interaction Buttons to the Left
rosettaIconsDesc: *NEW* Use the pre 2017 Rosetta icon font
